attributes.action: Publish the Sue Gray report without redactions once the police enquiry is over.
attributes.additional_details:
The public deserve to read the unedited report so they can draw their own conclusions about whether Boris Johnson has wilfully mislead Parliament and the British people. He should not be allowed to hide behind a redacted version of this report.
The majority of the British people have followed the rules and this has meant they have had to miss spending time with people who are no longer with us.
The Nation deserves to know the truth about how the Prime Minister and his cabinet have been behaving.
attributes.background: Make the full Sue Gray report available to the public without redactions as soon as possible after the conclusion of the MET police enquiry.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
